display_long_description:
A dungeon filled with deadly trials awaits…
Climb your way up and conquer it! A new stage, Divine Dungeon, has arrived!

Ascend a dark and ominous dungeon under low-gravity conditions.
Winds blow throughout the stage.
Ride the wind to soar upward in a single leap!
But stay sharp! With low gravity, one misjudged move can send you flying.
And the most dangerous obstacle of all: the statues.
Never touch the beams they unleash!

In this dungeon, whether you can reach the door at the summit depends entirely on your strength and the gods favor.

**This game is a challenge for all VR gamers who love physics and brain teasers.**
 For VR gamers who are strong in both mind and arm... see you at the top!
[media]

# 💪Your hands are crowbars—ready to start climbing💪

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

[media]

# 🧗‍♂️Master the art of climbing through physics!🧗‍♀️

Control your environment and body using a crowbar that reacts to every move.
Grab hooks at the last second, launch yourself with powerful swings, and cling to ledges in creative ways.

[media]

# 📸Share your gameplay videos with friends!🎥

Record both first-person and third-person perspectives, just like in the promo video.

Show off your crowbar-climbing skills to friends or share on social media.


[media]

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?
